name: 2022 11th International Conference on Communications, Circuits and Systems
content: Publication: -【Quick&Stable Index-Ei Compendex & Scopus】 The registered and presented papers will be published into ICCCAS 2022 conference proceedings, which is indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus. \*\*Special Issue\*\*【SCIE】 Selected registered abstract/paper can be recommended for potential publication in Sensors (ISSN 1424-8220). Impact Factor: 3.576 Indexing: SCIE (Web of Science), Scopus, Ei Compendex, PubMed, MEDLINE, PMC, Embase, Inspec, and other databases.
